title: [AnimeRG] One Punch Man OAD [576p] [E2B53313].mkv
description:
Come Join us on our Website! :-

Come Join us in our IRC Channel! :-   


..::Credits::..
Raw : Ohys-Raws
Translator : platypus364 (Reddit User) & ScavvyKiD
Timer, Editor : ScavvyKiD
Typesetter & QC : isoTropic & ScavvyKiD

Notes:
1.) This is OAD (Original Animation DVD) and not the OVA that is going 
to be bundled with BluRays. So, uploaders, please get your facts straight and stop confusing
yourselves and people about this OAD!

2.) 'platypus364' translated from spanish to english and posted on reddit. 
onepunchman.tv took his translation and so did other groups, but, never credited 
the translator. It's NOT good guys!

3.) To other releasers (who have released this OAD), at least FUCKING look 
at the subs timing, grammar and translations before releasing it (without crediting the translator). 
And for Christ's sake, stop pretending that you yourselves TLd this!

4.) And to people who are going to use these subs 
without crediting us, FUCK YOU!

5.) And last but not the least, Thank You Ohys for the raw!


If you think that there is/are error(s) in the subs, like some line(s) 
is/are mistranslated, then please post the line(s) and the correct translation for it. 
I'll do a V2 ASAP!


..::Video Specs::..

Format/Info : Advanced Video Codec
Resolution : 1280x576
Frame Rate : 23.976 fps

..::Audio Specs::..

Format/Info : Advanced Audio Codec
Channels : 2 channels
Sample Rate : 48KHz
Language : Japanese

..::Subtitles::..

Language : English
Type : Soft Coded
Format : ASS
